plurals.name: dialog_message_delete_box_full_to_delete
plurals.item:
"Messages cannot be deleted because the Deleted folder is full.
Would you like to empty the Deleted folder and continue deleting the messages?"

"Message cannot be deleted because the Deleted folder is full.
Would you like to empty the Deleted folder and continue deleting the message?"

plurals.name: dialog_message_delete_failed_and_delete_box_full
plurals.item:
"%1$d messages could not be deleted because the Deleted folder is full.
Would you like to empty the Deleted folder and continue deleting the messages?"

"%1$d message could not be deleted because the Deleted folder is full.
Would you like to empty the Deleted folder and continue deleting the message?"

plurals.name: dialog_message_inbox_folder_full_to_restore
plurals.item:
"The messages cannot be restored because the Inbox is full.
Please delete or save messages to your SD card to clear space and try again."

"The message cannot be restored because the Inbox is full.
Please delete or save messages to your SD card to clear space and try again."

plurals.name: dialog_message_inbox_folder_full_restore_incomplete
plurals.item:
"%1$d messages could not be restored because the Inbox is full.
Please delete or save messages to your SD card to clear space and try again."

"%1$d message could not be restored because the Inbox is full.
Please delete or save messages to your SD card to clear space and try again."

plurals.name: dialog_message_inbox_folder_full_to_move
plurals.item:
"The messages cannot be moved because the Inbox is full.
Please delete or save messages to your SD card to clear space and try again."

"The message cannot be moved because the Inbox is full.
Please delete or save messages to your SD card to clear space and try again."

plurals.name: dialog_message_inbox_folder_full_move_incomplete
plurals.item:
"%1$d messages could not be moved because the Inbox is full.
Please delete or save messages to your SD card to clear space and try again."

"%1$d message could not be moved because the Inbox is full.
Please delete or save messages to your SD card to clear space and try again."

plurals.name: dialog_message_delete_done
plurals.item: Messages have been successfully deleted.
Message has been successfully deleted.

plurals.name: dialog_message_restore_done
plurals.item: %1$d messages have been restored to the Inbox.
Message has been restored to the Inbox.

plurals.name: toast_message_messages_deleted
plurals.item: %1$d messages deleted.
Message deleted.

plurals.name: toast_message_canbe_restored_to_inbox
plurals.item: The messages can be restored from the Deleted folder.
The message can be restored from the Deleted folder.

plurals.name: toast_message_moved_to_sd_card
plurals.item: %1$d messages have been moved to your SD card.
1 message has been moved to your SD card.

plurals.name: toast_message_moved_to_inbox
plurals.item: %1$d messages have been moved to your Inbox.
1 message has been moved to your Inbox.

plurals.name: dialog_title_delete_message
plurals.item: Delete messages
Delete message

plurals.name: permanently_delete_message_from_saved
plurals.item:
"Deleting messages from SD card will permanently delete the messages.
Are you sure you want to permanently delete these messages?"

"Deleting a message from SD card will permanently delete the message.
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this message?"

plurals.name: permanently_delete_message_from_saved_locked
plurals.item:
"Deleting messages from SD card will permanently delete the messages.
Some of the selected messages are locked. Are you sure you want to permanently delete these messages?"

"Deleting a message from SD card will permanently delete the message.
The selected message is locked. Are you sure you want to permanently delete this message?"

plurals.name: dialog_message_saved_folder_full_to_move
plurals.item:
"%1$d messages could not be moved because the SD card is full.
Please clear some space and try again."

"1 message could not be moved because the SD card is full.
Please clear some space and try again."

plurals.name: dialog_message_saved_folder_count_full_to_move
plurals.item:
"%1$d messages could not be moved because we can only store 500 messages on the SD card.
Please clear some space and try again."

"1 message could not be moved because we can only store 500 messages on the SD card.
Please clear some space and try again."

plurals.name: dialog_restore_inbox
plurals.item: The selected messages will be restored to the Inbox.
The selected message will be restored to the Inbox.

plurals.name: dialog_message_delete_locked
plurals.item: Some of the selected messages are locked. Do you want to delete them all anyway?
The selected message is locked. Do you want to delete it anyway?

plurals.name: dialog_message_delete_unheard
plurals.item: The selected messages will be deleted. Please note that one or more messages are unheard.
The selected message will be deleted. Please note that message is unheard.

plurals.name: dialog_message_delete_locked_and_unheard
plurals.item: Some of the selected messages are unheard or locked. Do you want to delete them anyway?
The selected message is unheard or locked. Do you want to delete it anyway?

plurals.name: dialog_message_delete
plurals.item: The selected messages will be deleted.
The selected message will be deleted.

plurals.name: dialog_message_delete_outbox
plurals.item: The selected messages will be deleted. Please note that these messages have not been sent.
The selected message will be deleted. Please note that message has not been sent.

plurals.name: dialog_message_multi_restore
plurals.item: Restoring %1$d of %2$d messages
Restoring %1$d of %2$d message

plurals.name: dialog_message_multi_restore_cancel
plurals.item:
"Are you sure you want to cancel this restore request?
%1$d of %2$d messages have been restored so far."

"Are you sure you want to cancel this restore request?
%1$d of %2$d message has been restored so far."

plurals.name: dialog_message_permanently_delete_locked
plurals.item:
"Some of the selected messages are locked. Deleting messages from the SD card will permanently delete them. This cannot be undone.
Do you want to permanently delete them all anyway?"

"This message is locked. Deleting the message from the SD card will permanently delete it. This cannot be undone.
Do you want to permanently delete it anyway?"

plurals.name: dialog_message_permanently_delete_unheard
plurals.item: The selected messages will be permanently deleted. Please note that one or more messages are unheard.
The selected message will be permanently deleted. Please note that message is unheard.

plurals.name: dialog_message_permanently_delete_locked_and_unheard
plurals.item: Some of the selected messages are unheard or locked. Do you want to permanently delete them anyway?
The selected message is unheard or locked. Do you want to permanently delete it anyway?

plurals.name: dialog_message_permanently_delete
plurals.item: The selected messages will be permanently deleted.
The selected message will be permanently deleted.

plurals.name: dialog_message_multi_delete
plurals.item: Deleting %1$d of %2$d messages
Deleting %1$d of %2$d message

plurals.name: dialog_message_multi_delete_cancel
plurals.item:
"Are you sure you want to cancel this delete request?
%1$d of %2$d messages have been deleted so far."

"Are you sure you want to cancel this delete request?
%1$d of %2$d message has been deleted so far."

plurals.name: dialog_message_multi_move
plurals.item: Moving %1$d of %2$d messages
Moving %1$d of %2$d message

plurals.name: dialog_message_move
plurals.item: The selected messages will be moved.
The selected message will be moved.

plurals.name: dialog_message_multi_move_cancel
plurals.item:
"Are you sure you want to cancel this move request?
%1$d of %2$d messages have been moved so far."

"Are you sure you want to cancel this move request?
%1$d of %2$d message has been moved so far."
